Detailed Description

A list of all known modules (only used by the leader).

void ModuleList::checkTimeForStatistics (   ) 
 

Removes ModuleNotices that hasn't reported statiistics in MAX_TIME_NO_STATISTICS ms.

They are assumed to be down.

bool  maps = true
)  [virtual]
 

Method used for debug-printing.

Parameters:

pair<ModuleNotice*, uint32> ModuleList::getOldestMap (  set< uint32 > &  avoid  )

Parameters:
avoid Maps not to count.

const vector<ModuleNotice*>& ModuleList::removeWorst (  vector< ModuleNotice * > &  storage,
const vector< ModuleNotice * > &  in_notices
)  const
 

Removes the worst modules from a candidate list.

The worst modules are modules with a load of at least 10 that have a load at least 10 times that of the one with the lowest load.

Parameters:
storage Vector that could be used to store the notices.
in_notices Vector to get the notices from.
Returns:
Reference to storage or in_notices.

Sets if the (experimental) map balancing should be used.
